alert.note: Alert for Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 1:38PM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY BELOW 5000 FEET... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Lower elevations of Gila County. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. In addition, winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will develop behind a cold front on Wednesday, causing areas of blowing snow and poor visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
